Grid - Class in de.ad.sudoku
This class represents a Sudoku Grid consisting of a 9x9 matrix containing nine 3x3 sub-grids of Grid.Cells.
Grid.Cell - Class in de.ad.sudoku
This class represents a Cell within a Sudoku Grid.
